titleStmt.title: The famous and renowned history of the nine worthies of the world ... giving a true historical account of their glorious lives, victories, and deat[hs].
titleStmt.author: R. B., 1632?-1725?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Nathaniel Crouch [i.e. R.B.]. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Last part of imprint cut off. W.O. is probably William Onley, who printed 1697-1709. The first ed. of this work was in 1687.
Reproduction of original in Folger Library.

(from t.p.) I. Hector, Son of Priamus, King of Troy -- II. Alexander the Great ... -- III. Julius Caesar ... -- IV. Joshua, Captain-general of Israel -- V. David, King of Israel -- VI. Judas Maccabeus ... VII. Arthur, the famous British king -- VIII. Charles the Great, Emperour of Germany -- IX. Godfrey of Battoigne, King of Jerusalem.
